attributes.action: Scrap the Road Tax for all mopeds and motorcycles as a means of promoting them as a viable alternative mode of transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All forms of powered two wheelers use less fuel, cause less damage to the infrastructure, cause no congestion and take up less parking space.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
